Headline: Yellow  Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks. 

Shuttles buses are available from Howard to Skokie to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
